channel.title: Ngc1491 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Ngc1491 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Fossil Footprint Nebula
item.description: Here’s an image of NGC 1491 (also designated Sharpless Sh2-206), a faint emission nebula that has an interesting shape. Some sources give it the name Fossil Footprint nebula.
